name: dmmdpxl - Sly Blue
description: A Dramatical Murder dashboard theme with Sly Blue and my other styles put together Includes: Aoba Icons , DMMd pixel sprites icons , DMMd logo
additional_info: The code is a complete disaster because it was my first, but i really liked this theme so now that i'm letting it go i thought i'd share, since most DMMd themes i've seen are very light.
